metadata.name: DIM_SENSORS
metadata.comment: Dimension table for sensors, detailing device, room, sensor type, and measurement unit.

SENSOR_ID.name: SENSOR_ID
SENSOR_ID.comment: Surrogate key for a specific sensor instance (device, room, type).

ROOM.name: ROOM
ROOM.comment: Room where the sensor is located or 'outdoor'/'indoor' for general device sensors.

SENSOR_TYPE.name: SENSOR_TYPE
SENSOR_TYPE.comment: Type of measurement the sensor records (e.g., co2(parts per million), temperature(celsius)).

MEASUREMENT_UNIT.name: MEASUREMENT_UNIT
MEASUREMENT_UNIT.comment: The unit of measurement for the sensor_type (e.g., ppm, %, °C).

bytes.label: Approximate Size
bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

row_count.label: Row Count
row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: INT_IOT_DATA_WITH_WEATHER
metadata.comment: Enriches unpivotted IoT sensor data with corresponding hourly weather information based on location and time.

EVENT_TIMESTAMP.name: EVENT_TIMESTAMP
EVENT_TIMESTAMP.comment: Timestamp of the IoT sensor reading.

COUNTRY.name: COUNTRY
COUNTRY.comment: Country where the IoT device is located.

CITY.name: CITY
CITY.comment: City where the IoT device is located.

DEVICE_ID.name: DEVICE_ID
DEVICE_ID.comment: Unique identifier for the IoT device.

ROOM.name: ROOM
ROOM.comment: Room associated with the sensor reading.

SENSOR_TYPE.name: SENSOR_TYPE
SENSOR_TYPE.comment: Type of sensor and its unit.

SENSOR_VALUE.name: SENSOR_VALUE
SENSOR_VALUE.comment: The actual value recorded by the sensor.

OUTDOOR_TEMPERATURE_CELSIUS.name: OUTDOOR_TEMPERATURE_CELSIUS
OUTDOOR_TEMPERATURE_CELSIUS.comment: Outdoor temperature in Celsius from weather data.

DEW_POINT_TEMPERATURE_CELSIUS.name: DEW_POINT_TEMPERATURE_CELSIUS
DEW_POINT_TEMPERATURE_CELSIUS.comment: Dew point temperature in Celsius from weather data.

MEAN_SEA_LEVEL_PRESSURE_HPA.name: MEAN_SEA_LEVEL_PRESSURE_HPA
MEAN_SEA_LEVEL_PRESSURE_HPA.comment: Mean sea level pressure in hPa from weather data.

WIND_SPEED_MS.name: WIND_SPEED_MS
WIND_SPEED_MS.comment: Wind speed in m/s from weather data.

VISIBILITY_KM.name: VISIBILITY_KM
VISIBILITY_KM.comment: Visibility in km from weather data.

SOLAR_IRRADIANCE_W_M2.name: SOLAR_IRRADIANCE_W_M2
SOLAR_IRRADIANCE_W_M2.comment: Solar irradiance in W/m2 from weather data.

SUNSHINE_DURATION_MINUTES.name: SUNSHINE_DURATION_MINUTES
SUNSHINE_DURATION_MINUTES.comment: Sunshine duration in minutes from weather data.

bytes.label: Approximate Size
bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

row_count.label: Row Count
row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: STG_IOT_DATA
metadata.comment: Stages raw IoT sensor data, providing various readings per device and timestamp. This model represents the wide format of the source data.

EVENT_TIMESTAMP.name: EVENT_TIMESTAMP
EVENT_TIMESTAMP.comment: Timestamp of the IoT sensor reading.

COUNTRY.name: COUNTRY
COUNTRY.comment: Country where the IoT device is located.

CITY.name: CITY
CITY.comment: City where the IoT device is located.

DEVICE_ID.name: DEVICE_ID
DEVICE_ID.comment: Unique identifier for the IoT device.

CO2_BEDROOM_PPM.name: CO2_BEDROOM_PPM
CO2_BEDROOM_PPM.comment: CO2 level in bedroom (parts per million).

CO2_KITCHEN_PPM.name: CO2_KITCHEN_PPM
CO2_KITCHEN_PPM.comment: CO2 level in kitchen (parts per million).

OUTDOOR_TEMPERATURE_C.name: OUTDOOR_TEMPERATURE_C
OUTDOOR_TEMPERATURE_C.comment: Outdoor temperature (Celsius) reported by IoT device.

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: DIM_LOCATIONS
metadata.comment: Dimension table for locations, providing unique city and country combinations.

bytes.label: Approximate Size
bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

row_count.label: Row Count
row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: STG_ACCUWEATHER_HOURLY
metadata.comment: Stages hourly weather data from AccuWeather Snowflake Marketplace source, providing weather metrics for various cities.

CITY_NAME.name: CITY_NAME
CITY_NAME.comment: Name of the city for the weather reading.

MEAN_SEA_LEVEL_PRESSURE_HPA.name: MEAN_SEA_LEVEL_PRESSURE_HPA
MEAN_SEA_LEVEL_PRESSURE_HPA.comment: Mean sea level pressure in hPa.

WIND_SPEED_MS.name: WIND_SPEED_MS
WIND_SPEED_MS.comment: Wind speed in meters per second.

SOLAR_IRRADIANCE_W_M2.name: SOLAR_IRRADIANCE_W_M2
SOLAR_IRRADIANCE_W_M2.comment: Solar irradiance in Watts per square meter.

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: DIM_TIME
metadata.comment: Dimension table for time, providing various date and time attributes for each event_timestamp.

TIME_ID.name: TIME_ID
TIME_ID.comment: Surrogate key for a unique event_timestamp.

DAY_OF_WEEK.name: DAY_OF_WEEK
DAY_OF_WEEK.comment: Day of the week (e.g., 0 for Sunday, 1 for Monday in Snowflake DOW).

IS_WEEKEND.name: IS_WEEKEND
IS_WEEKEND.comment: Boolean indicating if the day is a weekend.

DAY_NAME.name: DAY_NAME
DAY_NAME.comment: Name of the day (e.g., Monday, Tuesday).

MONTH_NAME.name: MONTH_NAME
MONTH_NAME.comment: Name of the month (e.g., January, February).

bytes.label: Approximate Size
bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

row_count.label: Row Count
row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: INT_IOT_DATA_UNPIVOTTED
metadata.comment: Transforms wide-format IoT data into a long format, with one row per sensor reading. Classifies room and sensor type.

EVENT_TIMESTAMP.name: EVENT_TIMESTAMP
EVENT_TIMESTAMP.comment: Timestamp of the IoT sensor reading.

COUNTRY.name: COUNTRY
COUNTRY.comment: Country where the IoT device is located.

CITY.name: CITY
CITY.comment: City where the IoT device is located.

DEVICE_ID.name: DEVICE_ID
DEVICE_ID.comment: Unique identifier for the IoT device.

ROOM.name: ROOM
ROOM.comment: Room associated with the sensor reading (e.g., bedroom, kitchen, outdoor).

SENSOR_TYPE.name: SENSOR_TYPE
SENSOR_TYPE.comment: Type of sensor (e.g., co2, relative_humidity, temperature) and its unit.

SENSOR_VALUE.name: SENSOR_VALUE
SENSOR_VALUE.comment: The actual value recorded by the sensor.

bytes.label: Approximate Size
bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

row_count.label: Row Count
row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: FCT_READINGS
metadata.comment: Fact table containing all IoT sensor readings, enriched with weather data and dimensional keys. This model is configured for incremental loading and clustered by event_date.

READING_ID.name: READING_ID
READING_ID.comment: Surrogate primary key for each reading, generated from event_timestamp and device_id.

TIME_ID.name: TIME_ID
TIME_ID.comment: Foreign key referencing the dim_time dimension, linking to detailed time attributes.

LOCATION_ID.name: LOCATION_ID
LOCATION_ID.comment: Foreign key referencing the dim_locations dimension, linking to detailed location attributes.

SENSOR_ID.name: SENSOR_ID
SENSOR_ID.comment: Foreign key referencing the dim_sensors dimension, linking to detailed sensor attributes.

DEVICE_ID.name: DEVICE_ID
DEVICE_ID.comment: Identifier for the IoT device that produced the reading.

EVENT_TIMESTAMP.name: EVENT_TIMESTAMP
EVENT_TIMESTAMP.comment: The exact timestamp when the sensor event occurred, in UTC.

EVENT_DATE.name: EVENT_DATE
EVENT_DATE.comment: The date part of event_timestamp, used for partitioning and clustering.

SENSOR_VALUE.name: SENSOR_VALUE
SENSOR_VALUE.comment: The actual value recorded by the sensor.

OUTDOOR_TEMPERATURE_CELSIUS.name: OUTDOOR_TEMPERATURE_CELSIUS
OUTDOOR_TEMPERATURE_CELSIUS.comment: Outdoor temperature in Celsius at the time of the reading.

DEW_POINT_TEMPERATURE_CELSIUS.name: DEW_POINT_TEMPERATURE_CELSIUS
DEW_POINT_TEMPERATURE_CELSIUS.comment: Outdoor dew point temperature in Celsius.

MEAN_SEA_LEVEL_PRESSURE_HPA.name: MEAN_SEA_LEVEL_PRESSURE_HPA
MEAN_SEA_LEVEL_PRESSURE_HPA.comment: Mean sea level air pressure in hPa.

WIND_SPEED_MS.name: WIND_SPEED_MS
WIND_SPEED_MS.comment: Wind speed in meters per second.

SOLAR_IRRADIANCE_W_M2.name: SOLAR_IRRADIANCE_W_M2
SOLAR_IRRADIANCE_W_M2.comment: Solar irradiance in Watts per square meter.

SUNSHINE_DURATION_MINUTES.name: SUNSHINE_DURATION_MINUTES
SUNSHINE_DURATION_MINUTES.comment: Duration of sunshine in minutes for the period.

PRECIPITATION_TYPE_DESCRIPTION.name: PRECIPITATION_TYPE_DESCRIPTION
PRECIPITATION_TYPE_DESCRIPTION.comment: Textual description of the precipitation type (e.g., 'rain', 'snow', 'none').

bytes.label: Approximate Size
bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

clustering_key.label: Clustering Key
clustering_key.description: The key used to cluster this table

row_count.label: Row Count
row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table
